text: Ryan Murphy (born November 9, 1965) is an American screenwriter, director and producer. He is the creator of the television series Nip/Tuck and Glee. Murphy also made the WB network series Popular, which aired from 1999 to 2001. As of 2011, some movies he will direct are underworks. Murphy is a graduate of Warren Central High School in Indianapolis, Indiana. He also went to Indiana University in Bloomington, Indiana. ==Personal life== Murphy is openly gay. Murphy says he sometimes goes to church in Los Angeles. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:American television writers Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:Gay men Category:LGBT directors Category:LGBT producers Category:LGBT people from Indiana Category:LGBT screenwriters Category:Movie directors from Indiana Category:Movie producers from Indiana Category:Writers from Indianapolis Category:1965 births Category:Living people
title: Ryan Murphy
